title: My First Job!
text: I've got my first job as an Android developer at Mimo, located in Vienna. I'm super excited to dive into full time Android development.

title: Master of Science in Engineering!
text: I don't want to write about all the pain and the struggle of the recent months. I'm done. Finally I have my masters degree!

title: Shockbytes Homepage Relaunch
text: After hours of hard work, awesome times while learning Dart, and not so awesome times loosing nerves with CSS and HTML, Shockbytes Home is finally online. Angular and Dart make the new homepage more shiny and beautiful than ever before!
